channel.title: üè¢ Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: DiP-GO: A Diffusion Pruner via Few-step Gradient Optimization
item.description: DiP-GO: A novel pruning method accelerates diffusion models via few-step gradient optimization, achieving a 4.4x speedup on Stable Diffusion 1.5 without accuracy loss.

item.title: QT-ViT: Improving Linear Attention in ViT with Quadratic Taylor Expansion
item.description: QT-ViT boosts Vision Transformer efficiency by using quadratic Taylor expansion to approximate self-attention, achieving state-of-the-art accuracy and speed.
